title: Nice sans with Caecilia.?
content:
Hi,

Looking for a sans that works well as body text with Caecilia as headings.

Currently considering:

Frutiger  
Futura  
Avenir  
Amplitude

Any suggestions appreciated, looking for some options...  
Needs to be professional with personality..

Cheers.
